system.description:
At 17th level, you become an implacable figure of judgment. You are under a continuous @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4rgo85d49qwancup]{Detect Thoughts} effect with a range of 10 feet (it emits no magical aura). You may teleport a distance of up to your walking speed as a bonus action once per round.

Additionally, creatures you kill have their souls immediately sent to their final judgment. This prevents @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6ia3gup3j0m6oigb]{Speak with Dead} from working on their remains, prevents the remains from being reanimated as an Undead creature, and their remains acquire the doomed condition. The soul of a creature slain by you cannot be captured on its way to judgment by any means short of an artifact or the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pe52jryde7ljobzq]{Wish} spell.
